num-per-page.fieldDescription: Number of booths shown on each page
num-per-page.name: ./numPerPage

text.fieldDescription: Enter {{name}} for the council name, {{url}} for the link to the council website. More options can be found in the "special characters" menu (The star button).
text.name: ./path1Text

shareDialogDescription.fieldDescription: Text in the "share" dialog. Also the text of the Facebook share.
shareDialogDescription.name: ./path1ShareDialogDescription

shareDialogTweet.fieldDescription: Text to include in the tweet.
shareDialogTweet.name: ./path1ShareDialogTweet
